title: What are some counter examples to Kant's moral philosophy about doing the right thing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Going with Kant ethical view euthanasia would be wrong. As killing yourself is wrong and it is a form of giving consent to someone to end your life. Also I think he would have been against abortion of a fetus with genetical syndromes. Kant's philosophy is most Vulnerable when there are cases of good outcome against doing something which he considerd morally wrong.
